name: CyberLink Power2Go 10 Platinum
detailed_description:
Power2Go delivers end-to-end functionality for all burning, backup and conversion needs. Incorporating advanced disc burning with military-grade encryption, Power2Go also provides advanced media conversion for music and video files, covering the broadest range of device and media player profiles. With Facebook, Flickr, YouTube & Vimeo integration, you can effortlessly download, convert, and back up your social media content, or your most treasured videos.

Features:


  • BURN & CREATE
    Create your own personal compilations in moments
    Power2Go’s advanced burning engine makes it a snap to burn CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray discs — even the latest 128GB BDXL discs. Duplicate CDs, unprotected DVDs and Blu-ray discs by burning 1:1 copies of your discs. Save a copy of a disc to your hard drive as a disc image and later burn the images back to disc.


  • CONVERT & TRANSFER
    Support for over 150 portable device profiles
    Smart Detect technology solves the problem of confusing file formats and resolutions.. As soon as you connect a device to your PC, Smart Detect recognizes it and sets the optimal output formats and resolutions for converted media, ensuring best possible quality. The free companion App, Power Media Player, delivers superior playback quality.

  • BACK UP & PROTECT
    Download, convert and back up social media content and favorite videos
    Enjoy your favorite videos anytime. Search and download videos from YouTube and Vimeo to your hard drive, or burn them directly to disc to watch when you want. Securely back up, and be in complete control of your personal online media content with easy backup from Facebook and Flickr.

Trusted by leading PC and burner manufacturers

Global PC and burner manufacturers depend on Power2Go’s robust ability to burn mixed media onto any disc type. Easy-to-use and packed with innovative features, the added system recovery and data encryption functions make Power2Go the smart choice for your system.

short_description: Power2Go has ability to burn mixed media onto any disc type, establishing it as one of the most flexible solutions available. The addition of system recovery and military-grade encryption has delivered expanded capabilities for system and data security.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“"You will not easily find a software tool capable of matching the many disc-related utilities that Power2Go offers." Software.informer, US, 04/2014”
5 Stars – Editor's Pick Award, Software.informer, US

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10, 8/8.1, 7, Vista
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz, or AMD Athlon 700 MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris™/Iris™ Pro Graphics: 5000 Series, Intel® HD Graphics: 4000 Series, 3000 Series, 2000 Series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
